Yesssss, while we're on the subject...

Wilddance_Mare, if you don't turn in Terrorsaur's (and Rattrap's) bio 
soon, I'm gonna take drastic measures. I don't know what they would 
be, but be sure that they would be horrible, maybe horrible to the 
point of me writing him a bio (trust me, you don't want that).

I'm kidding, but please turn in a bio.
